content: प्रतिभिद् {c7c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To break through, pierce, penetrate. {@--2@} To disclose, betray. {@--3@} To reproach, abuse, censure; प्रतिभिद्य कांतमपराधकृतं <ls>Śi. 9. 58</ls>; <ls>R. 19. 22.</ls> {@--4@} To reject, disown. {@--5@} To touch, be in close contact with; <ls>Ku. 7. 35.</ls>
